definition: the act of caressing with the lips (or an instance thereof), to touch with the lips or press the lips against someone's mouth or other body part as an expression of love, greeting, etc
details:
noun
- the act of caressing with the lips (or an instance thereof)
= synonyms: kiss
verb
- to touch with the lips or press the lips against someone's mouth or other body part as an expression of love, greeting, etc
= example: to touch with the lips or press the lips against someone's mouth or other body part as an expression of love, greeting, etc
= synonyms: kiss
